Infectra



*Infectra looks around herself. She figures that she was alone =
and frowns and sits at a table and bangs her head it and knocks herself int=
o sleep*

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: THECODE 
  To: NBW 
  Sen=
t: Monday, August 28, 2000 5:19 PM
  Subject: Serge noticed...


  The Chos=
en Ones all exit the CR Chambers, all except for Airbomber. Deemos looks ou=
tsidem he sees a pod, and a T-Rex bot by it.

  "Maximals, I shall handle t=
his." Deemos said. He walked outside.

  "Welcome, I am Deemos, a leader of=
 a group! A group that is within the Maximals!" Deemos says. Serge looks do=
wn at Deemos. Deemos slowly looks up at Serge's face.

  "You have a robot =
mode, I trust?" Deemos says. Serge transforms and looks down at Deemos.

  =
"We are trying to make things right, and.." Deemos is cut off.

  "I'm look=
ing for a team that kills everyone! I'm in the mood to bust some Preds." Se=
rge said.

  "Right, well, we do that, I killed alot of Predacons and other=
 assorted troublemakers in my days, so if you would be kind to join us, you=
 see, we would be whole again, I...am afraid we lost one of our bots. His n=
ame was Artist." Deemos said.

  "Oh, my! Those Preds are going to pay!" Se=
rge says.

  "Indeed, now, if you would come to the Pred cave, we have some=
 work to do." Deemos said. The Chosen Ones all transformed to their Beast m=
odes. Recap: Deemos is a vulture, Diskus is a wasp, Stronghold is an elepha=
nt, Blender is a piranha, Rizopas is also a piranha, Serge is a T-rex, Doom=
 Ice is a Lion Fish. They all head toward the Predacon cave again. There ar=
e 7 of them...
